name: Lettris
description:
A combination of Tetris and Scrabble. Form words in either English or

Swedish to prevent the blocks to reach the top of the screen. The words
are formed by marking the available block-letters in the order of the
word. Score points by making good words, good words also grants
bonus-blocks.

The game gets progressively harder fast, both because of faster game speed but also new types of annoying blocks.

It is played directly in the browser and is easier to play on a phone/tablet.

All constructive feedback is appreciated! (also non-constructive positive feedback!)
